remarks: Property of a monoid homomorphism, expressed by a magma homomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 17-Apr-2020.)
statement:
ismhm0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
ismhm0.c $e |- C = ( Base ` T ) $.
ismhm0.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` S ) $.
ismhm0.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` T ) $.
ismhm0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` S ) $.
ismhm0.y $e |- Y = ( 0g ` T ) $.
ismhm0 $p |- ( F e. ( S MndHom T ) <-> ( ( S e. Mnd /\ T e. Mnd ) /\ ( F e. ( S MgmHom T ) /\ ( F ` .0. ) = Y ) ) ) $.
